captions.text: Hi, how are you doing?! My name is Otário (Sucker)!
I recently made a question on my Facebook page...
Wondering what should be the main demands of the protests against the Government
And guess what was the most requested demand?
The majority of people requires a 80% reduction in politician's salaries!
But, is it too much?
A Congressman earns about 13,5 thousand dollars (monthly)!
Even if that salary was reduced by 80%
He still continues with a salary of more than 2500 dollars!
What is 3X higher than the average salary of Brazilian workers!
Who receives less than $900 per month
Certainly, the man who represents the people can survive with 3X the peoples' average salary!
What? You think it's not enough?
Then, screw you!
Go work somewhere else! But not as a politician!
Well, but the politicians are very important to people's lives and deserve every penny they get!
Really?
A garbage collector receives about 350 dollars per month.
It's 37 times less than a congressman.
But is the services provided by a congressman really worth 37 times more than the services provided by a garabge collector?
Let's do a little exercise ...
Imagine what would happen if the garbage collector do not collect the garbage of your street for a day ...
a week ...
a month ...
a year ...
Better stop here, huh?
Now, imagine what would happen if a politician miss his work for a day ...
a week ... a month ... a year ...
If you know what I mean!
And I'm not even taking into account the benefits and grants they receive ...
In the case of the Senators, ... for example, it's up to 7,5 thousand dollars monthly!
That can be spent on food, airline tickets, hotels, fuel, private security, car rental... and so on!
Oh, and they still have a plus of $1900, for housing assistance, and medical care (unlimited)
They also receive dental and psychological assistance up to $13000 (Annual)
It's enough of fuel's assistance, It's enough of housing assistance, It's enough of every thing
Don' t fuck with me!
There are 81 Senators, 513 Federal Congressmen, more than 1000 State Congressmen and more than 59 000 Councilors!
If just the salaries of all these S.O.B. were reduced by 80%
We would save at least: 2 BILLION dollars (per year)!
This is more than the brazilian government spends on: public safety, sanitation, or science and technology!
Stop fucking with citizen's money!
Your salaries and benefits may be legal, but they are immoral!
Have some respect and reduce your salaries!
To do that, you do not need any law or special permit ...
You just need a pen and a paper!
So?! What are you waiting for to sign, motherfucker!
Did you like it, then click the like button and share this information, we have to keep pushing these bastards.
Follow my pages on Facebook and Twitter
And do not forget to check my website... (canaldootario.com)
Because, I get censored on youtube, this is not going happen on my website
Politicians, you have seen what the people are able to do, right?
So I advice you to look very carefully about this issue ...
Scary scream!
Ah, do you know what were the other main demands made by the people?
Then check out the links in the videos' description or visit my website (blog session)
Let's fuck those motherfuckers!
Otário A. Anonymous - @CanalDoOtario

comments.author: Construtora VilaVerde Ltda

comments.text:
It is interesting to see how universal our desire is to be free from 
control.

I hope that this political activism in Brazil is motivated by moral 
philosophical principles and not a result of immediate desire for material 
gratification and short term solutions.

The 'Arab spring' started because people were starving and the prices and 
shortages for bread were becoming intolerable. The unrest was not motivated 
by morality; people just wanted food. They didn't understand the economic 
and philosophical principles necessary to make food available so they chose 
the short term solutions. They protested and rioted and revolted against 
their governments, demanding the leaders be replaced by other leaders. The 
result was predictable: the armies seized power and installed generals as 
the figure heads and the people were satisfied with a little more bread 
handed out in the government food lines.

I hope Brazilians learn from this. Short term solutions using the 
government will not solve the problems caused by government. Often times, 
it makes things worse.﻿

comments.text:
Primeiro acho muita sacanagem receberem salários, pois vereador, deputado 
estadual, federal e senadores não devem ser considerados profissão e por 
isso não fazem jus ao termo salário. Isso deveria ser extinto. Sou a favor 
de uma ajuda de custo unica com um valor prefixado e baseado no salário 
mínimo algo como "a ajuda de custo mensal para exercer o mandato, onde não 
se pode ultrapassar o teto de 100 salários mínimos por mês, onde todas as 
despesas devem ser contempladas dentro dessa ajuda de custo sem 
possibilidade de emendas ou auxílios extras provenientes do cofre publico" 
e caso queiram gozar de um plano de saúde devem usar o mais conhecido de 
todos o nosso querido e extremamente (¬¬) funcional SUS ou arcar com os 
custos por conta própria. Bom não sou letrado e não conheço os 
"juridiqueis" da vida, mas sei que se nos unirmos poderemos fazer alguma 
coisa.﻿

comments.author: Admilton Araujo

comments.text:
Duas sugestões de vídeos: Primeiro, sobre o problema da água, quer dizer, 
falta de água em SP, que ocorre não pode falta de chuva mas sim por falta 
de investimento decente na captação, economia e preservação dos mananciais 
de SP.

A segunda sugestão é falar da inércia no Poder Legislativo no que concerne 
à atualização no valor das multas de trânsito. Embora o valor das multas vá 
para o próprio Poder Público, a falta de atualização dos valores das multas 
(base na UFIR) faz com que o cumprimento da legislação de trânsito vire 
letra morta. Apenas as multas por infrações muito graves são punidas 
severamente, enquanto que para as outras continuam sendo multadas com 
valores que não tem caráter coercitivo. Exemplos: conduzir criança menores 
de sete anos em moto; transitar c/ veiculo em desacordo c/ especificações 
necessárias a sua identificação; conduzir o veiculo em mau estado de 
conservação; estacionar sobre ciclovia ou ciclofaixa.﻿
